summary: A toxic train derailment in Ohio led to the evacuation of much of the town of East Palestine. EPA Administrator Michael Regan visited the region on Thursday to assess the ongoing response and hear from impacted residents. Health officials are urging some East Palestine residents to drink bottled water until tests are complete. Flacco the rare Eurasian eagle owl escaped his enclosure on February 2nd and since then Zoo officials have kept an eye on the bird, which has become a bit of a celebrity. Zoo officials were most worried that Flaco didn't know how to hunt since he's always had his meals delivered.
